item.description:
The topic of this event is avoiding and overcoming overwhelm in business. We'll talk about strategies you can implement right away and the skills you can learn that will help you steer clear of overwhelm.

The Marketing Cafeâ„¢ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://authenticbusinessgrowth.com/overcoming-overwhelm/

Date: Thursday, August 30, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest is Linda Levin, PCC, executive & personal coach and workshop facilitator. Linda has been coaching individual and corporate clients for more than eleven years.

Linda believes that authentic change lies in discovering the relationship between core personal values and innate strengths. Her clients report newfound freedom to tap into their strengths with power and confidence.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC.

Get Show Access Info here: http://authenticbusinessgrowth.com/overcoming-overwhelm/

During this program you will learn:

  • The single most important thing to do right away when you feel overwhelmed
  • The two ways overwhelm impacts people negatively. (You need to know about both to effectively get rid of overwhelm.)
  • The 4 major consequences of too much overwhelm. (It's worse then you think.)
  • Three simple strategies you can put into action when you begin to feel overwhelmed
  • The number one skill you need to supercharge all the other strategies. (Caution: You have to do this the right way or you risk sabotaging yourself and making things worse.)
  • The role of mindset in overcoming overwhelm (Which do you think is more important taking action or your mental state?)
  • Three 3 word phrases that will each dramatically reduce reduce your overwhelm right away. (Each one of these is like a glass of cold water in the hot, thirsty desert.)
  • Four ways to prevent overwhelm. (If one of these doesn't work for you, at least some of them will.)

Get Show Access Info here: http://authenticbusinessgrowth.com/overcoming-overwhelm/
item.name: Strategies for Avoiding and Overcoming Overwhelm
